amendment.description: Amendment deletes language which would have allowed non-Members to file ethics complaints and requires all ethics complaints filed with the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to be sponsored by a sitting Member of the House.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require all ethics complaints filed with the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to be sponsored by a sitting Member of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murtha amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 193, 1 Present (Roll no. 409).
